biotools.summary: R Shiny app for automated high-throughput explorative analysis of multivariate behavioural data. The app is designed to provide an easy access to fundamental analysis techniques such as clustering, boxplot visualization and pairwise comparisons, heatmaps, principal component analysis (PCA), correlation matrices and pairwise correlations.

bioschemas.name: beeRapp
